reg_pit.acttitle: Business Practices and Consumer Protection Act
reg_pit.title: Travel Industry Regulation

change.changenote: Section 13 (0.1) was added by BC Reg 369/2008, effective December 1, 2009.
Section 14 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 369/2008, effective December 1, 2009.

subsection.subsectiontext: If the licensee is a travel agent, the security provided must be in the amount that is the total of

paragraph.paragraphtext: $5 000 for each location from which the travel agent conducts business in British Columbia other than the travel agent's principal location.
